column1: For the reasons adduced above, I proceed to issue a writ of certiorari also;

column2: quashing  the  orders  of the  learned  Magistrate made  on  02.03.2020  in  respect  of
the  Petitioner,  including  the  order  by  which  the  Petitioner  was  made  the  2nd
suspect in the case bearing No. B/299/2020
quashing the summons marked as P11

column1: I make no order for costs.
